description: IntroductionWith this handy, compact all in one Uspeed 3.5" Internal card reader/writer you can easily read and write to your digital memory cards! Easily install it into a 3.5" drive bay of your desktop computer.Features- Hot-swapping. Plug and play.- LED power/working indicator.- USB 3.0 20 pins connector.- 6 card slots.- 1 USB 3.0 port.Supports all popular memory cards- CF I, CF II- MD- SD, SDHC, Mini SD- MMC, RS-MMC- MS, MS ProSystem RequirementsWindows XP / Vista / 7 / 8Package includes1 USB 3.0 card readerPLEASE NOTE* Before Installing the Card reader/writer, please power off your computer, and check your computers motherboard is 3.0, if not, use a USB 3.0 PCI-E card with 20 pins connector.* To properly insert a CF card, please ensure proper orientation by confirming that the side grooves are facing / aligned with the dock ridges. Then, gently push the card straight in toward the pins until the card is fully seated.About UspeedWith a focus on computer peripherals, Uspeed is committed to providing products with sensible design and superior quality. By adopting the latest technology standards, we provide ideal solutions for fast data transmission, lowered power consumption and broad compatibility.
title: Uspeed USB 3.0 All-in-1 Card Reader Support for MD SD SDHC SDXC Mini SD MMC CF RS-MMC MS Micro SD with Front USB 3.0 Port for 3.5" Floppy Bay with USB 3.0 20 Pin Connector
